titles.title: Trade Equity Act of 1993
Regarding the tariff classification of motor vehicles for the transport of goods.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

bill.summary: 1/5/1993--Introduced. Trade Equity Act of 1993 - Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to classify certain light trucks or light-duty trucks as motor vehicles for the transport of goods for purposes of tariff treatment under the Schedule.
